hero.title: AI Legal Assistant for Administrative Law
hero.subtitle: Search court decisions and regulations across Montenegro, Serbia, and Croatia in seconds. Make informed legal decisions with AI-powered insights.
hero.tagline: Trusted by judges, lawyers, and legal researchers

testimonials.title: What Legal Professionals Say
testimonials.description: Accuracy, speed, and comprehensive coverage that help them make better legal decisions

t1.name: Dr. Marko Petrović
t1.quote: Lexora has transformed how I prepare my rulings. What used to take days of research now takes minutes. The cross-jurisdictional comparison feature is invaluable for ensuring consistency.

t2.name: Ana Nikolić
t2.quote: Being able to check success rates for similar cases before taking them on has changed how I advise my clients. The statistical analysis feature is simply not available anywhere else.

t3.name: Prof. Stefan Jovanović
t3.quote: For comparative legal research, Lexora is a game-changer. I can pull examples from all three jurisdictions in seconds and create comprehensive case studies for my students.
t3.role: Professor of Administrative Law, University of Montenegro

t4.name: Milica Stojanović
t4.quote: Finally, a tool that speaks plain language. I could understand my legal situation without hiring a lawyer first. The case summaries are clear and the precedents gave me confidence.

clients.title: Trusted by Leading Institutions
clients.description: Courts, law firms, and universities across the Western Balkans

getStarted.title: Get started in minutes
getStarted.description: Start researching with Lexora quickly and easily

step1.title: Sign Up for Free Trial
step1.description: Create your account and get immediate access to limited searches. No credit card required.

step2.title: Ask Your First Question
step2.description: Enter your legal query in natural language. Lexora will search across 1M+ court decisions instantly.

step3.title: Explore Results
step3.description: Review relevant cases, compare across jurisdictions, and get statistical insights on similar decisions.

step4.title: Choose Your Plan
step4.description: Upgrade to Professional or Enterprise for unlimited searches, advanced features, and API access.

featuresCta.title: Ready to Transform Your Legal Research?
featuresCta.description: Join judges, lawyers, and researchers across Montenegro, Serbia, and Croatia who save hours every week with Lexora's AI-powered legal research.

useCases.title: Trusted by Leading Legal Minds
useCases.subtitle: From courtrooms to law firms to research institutions—Lexora empowers every legal professional

judges.title: For Judges
judges.description: Make consistent, well-informed rulings by quickly finding similar cases across all three jurisdictions.

stats.stat1: Reduce research time from days to minutes
stats.stat2: Compare precedents across Montenegro, Serbia, Croatia

lawyers.title: For Lawyers & Attorneys
lawyers.description: Build stronger cases with comprehensive precedent analysis and success rate statistics.

stats.stat1: Analyze success rates for similar cases
stats.stat2: Find winning arguments from past decisions

researchers.title: For Researchers & Academics
researchers.description: Conduct comparative legal studies with the most complete administrative law database in the region.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing for Every User
pricing.description: From individual lawyers to institutional partners. Start with a free trial.
pricing.freeTrial: 14-day free trial - No credit card required

enterprise.title: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For law firms, courts, and institutions

pricing.a1: We offer three tiers: Free Trial (14 days, 10 searches/day), Professional ($99/month for unlimited searches), and Enterprise (custom pricing for institutions). All plans include access to all three jurisdictions and multilingual search.
pricing.a2: All plan prices include regular updates, technical support, and cloud hosting. Professional and Enterprise plans include statistical analytics, case summarization, and export features. No setup fees required.

features.title: Intelligent. Accurate. Always Learning.
features.description: Advanced AI-powered legal research that understands context, finds precedents across jurisdictions, and delivers insights legal professionals can trust.

feat1.title: Cross-Jurisdictional Search
feat1.description: Search and compare legal precedents across Montenegro, Serbia, and Croatia simultaneously. Find similar cases, identify jurisdictional differences, and understand regional legal trends—all in one query.

feat2.title: Statistical Legal Analytics
feat2.description: Go beyond case search with unique statistical insights. Analyze success rates, identify judicial patterns, track outcome trends, and make data-driven legal decisions based on historical case data.

feat3.title: Multi-Level Summarization
feat3.description: From quick executive summaries to comprehensive case analysis—get exactly the depth you need. AI-powered summarization with full citation traceability ensures you never miss critical details.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Konty POS system
faq.a1: Konty is a modern point-of-sale system that helps businesses digitize their operations. It enables sales tracking, inventory management, reporting, and compliance.
faq.a2: Yes, Konty works offline too. All data is stored locally and syncs automatically when you reconnect to the internet.
faq.a3: You can start in just 5 minutes! Sign up, add products, and start selling. No installation or special hardware required.
faq.a4: Yes, Konty is fully compliant with US tax regulations. Automatically generates compliant receipts and reports.
faq.a5: You get 30 days of free access to all features. No credit card required. After expiry, choose the plan that suits you.
faq.q2: Can I use Konty without internet?
faq.q3: How quickly can I start using it?
faq.q5: How does the free trial work?

hero.title: Everywhere you need it!
hero.subtitle: Get Konty for any device or platform.
hero.description: Whether you prefer the convenience of web-based access, the familiarity of Windows applications, the mobility of Android devices, or the reliability of MacOS, our software is adaptable to your preferred operating system.

hero.title: POS system you can count on during peak hours
hero.subtitle: Complete restaurant management system with table service, order processing, and kitchen coordination. Designed for businesses of all sizes.

benefits.title: Why Choose Konty for Your Restaurant
benefits.description: Built specifically for hospitality businesses, from small cafes to high-volume restaurants.

benefit1.title: Built for Hospitality
benefit1.description: Complete solution designed specifically for restaurants and cafes. Covers all your business processes efficiently, whether you run a small cafe or a high-traffic restaurant.

benefit2.title: Incredibly Easy to Use
benefit2.description: Tired of software that takes forever to do simple tasks? Konty is built to be intuitive, efficient, and gets the job done fast.

benefit3.title: Reliable & Secure
benefit3.description: No more fear of losing data from power outages. Konty is a full cloud software that ensures you never lose your data. All data is centralized and always accessible.

benefit4.title: Available Everywhere, Always
benefit4.description: Konty works on Web, Windows, and Android. 24/7, anywhere in the world, you have free remote access to your application.

benefit5.title: Advanced Reports
benefit5.description: Comprehensive and precise reports you need to run your business. Enables accurate tracking of inventory, sales, revenue, and expenses.

benefit6.title: Superior Customer Support
benefit6.description: Our team is available 24/7. Fast and efficient customer support is the foundation of our business.

faq.q1: How do I become a Lexora partner?
faq.a1: Fill out the partnership inquiry form on this page. Our partnerships team will contact you within 48 hours to discuss the partnership opportunity, requirements, and next steps.
faq.q2: What types of institutions can become partners?
faq.a2: We partner with law firms, courts, judicial institutions, universities, legal research centers, and legal technology providers across Montenegro, Serbia, and Croatia.
faq.a3: Partners receive comprehensive technical support, dedicated account management, ongoing training, co-branded marketing materials, and priority access to new features and updates.
faq.q4: How does pricing work for institutional partners?
faq.a4: We offer flexible volume licensing with discounts based on the number of users. Pricing varies by institution type (law firms, courts, universities) and is discussed during the partnership evaluation.
faq.q5: Can we integrate Lexora with our existing systems?
faq.a5: Yes, Lexora provides API access and technical documentation for integration with existing legal case management systems, research tools, and institutional platforms.

hero.title: Search Legal Precedents Across Three Countries Simultaneously
hero.subtitle: Find and compare administrative law cases from Montenegro, Serbia, and Croatia in a single search. Make stronger legal arguments with comprehensive regional insights.

howItWorks.title: How Cross-Jurisdictional Search Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Powerful AI technology that understands legal context across borders

step1.title: Enter Your Query
step1.description: Type your legal question in natural language - no complex syntax needed. Ask in any language.

step2.title: AI Searches All Jurisdictions
step2.description: Our system simultaneously searches 1M+ court decisions across Montenegro, Serbia, and Croatia.

step3.title: Compare Results Side-by-Side
step3.description: See how different courts ruled on similar cases. Identify patterns and differences instantly.

step4.title: Export to Your Documents

comparison.title: Before Lexora vs. With Lexora
comparison.subtitle: See the dramatic difference in legal research efficiency

before.title: Traditional Research Method
before.pain1: Search each country's database separately (3+ hours)
before.pain4: Miss relevant cases in other countries
before.pain5: Difficult to compare similar cases side-by-side

after.title: With Lexora Cross-Jurisdictional Search
after.benefit1: Single search finds cases in all 3 countries (<6 seconds)
after.benefit3: AI ensures consistent quality across all jurisdictions
after.benefit5: Built-in comparison tools highlight similarities and differences

faq.q1: Which countries does cross-jurisdictional search cover?
faq.a1: Currently covers Montenegro, Serbia, and Croatia. We're actively adding Bosnia and Herzegovina, with other Balkan countries planned for 2025.
faq.q2: Can I search in my own language?
faq.a2: Yes! Search in Serbian, Montenegrin, Croatian, Bosnian, or English. Our AI automatically searches across all jurisdictions regardless of query language.
faq.q3: How does Lexora match similar cases across different legal systems?
faq.a3: Our AI is trained on administrative law from all three jurisdictions. It understands legal concepts, terminology differences, and procedural variations to find truly relevant precedents.
faq.q4: Can I filter results by specific country?
faq.a4: Absolutely. You can search all countries simultaneously or filter to show results from specific jurisdictions. Comparison view lets you see differences side-by-side.

hero.title: Make Data-Driven Legal Decisions with Statistical Analytics
hero.subtitle: Analyze success rates, trends, and patterns across 1M+ administrative court decisions. Answer questions no other legal research tool can.

capabilities.title: What You Can Analyze
capabilities.subtitle: Statistical queries that transform how you approach legal research

cap1.title: Success Rate Analysis
cap1.description: What percentage of similar cases succeeded? Compare success rates across judges, courts, jurisdictions, and time periods.
cap1.example: "What's the success rate for tax assessment appeals in Montenegro from 2020-2024?"

cap2.title: Trend Detection
cap2.description: Identify emerging patterns in judicial rulings. Track how legal interpretations evolve over time.
cap2.example: "Show me trends in environmental permit disputes over the last 5 years."

cap3.title: Comparative Analysis
cap3.description: Compare outcomes across different variables: jurisdictions, court levels, case types, legal arguments.
cap3.example: "Compare success rates of administrative silence claims across all three countries."

cap4.title: Judge & Court Patterns
cap4.description: Understand judicial tendencies. Which judges favor certain arguments? Which courts have highest reversal rates?
cap4.example: "Analyze Administrative Court judge patterns in construction permit cases."

cap5.title: Argument Effectiveness
cap5.description: Measure which legal arguments succeed most often. Build your case strategy on proven approaches.
cap5.example: "Which arguments succeed most in procedural violation claims?"

cap6.title: Time-Based Patterns
cap6.description: Discover how case duration, filing timing, and procedural delays affect outcomes.
cap6.example: "Average case duration for successful vs unsuccessful appeals?"

examples.title: Real Analytics in Action
examples.subtitle: See how legal professionals use statistical insights to win cases

example1.question: What's the success rate for challenging building permits in Podgorica?
example1.insight: Cases citing procedural violations have 82% success vs 45% for substantive challenges
example1.action: Focus on procedural arguments rather than substantive merit

example2.question: How long do tax assessment appeals typically take?
example2.insight: Cases filed in Q1 resolve 23% faster than Q3-Q4 filings
example2.action: Advise clients on optimal filing timing

example3.question: Do environmental permit appeals succeed more in certain jurisdictions?
example3.insight: Croatian courts emphasize EU compliance standards more heavily
example3.action: Strengthen EU directive arguments when litigating in Croatia

before.title: Without Statistical Analytics
before.pain1: Anecdotal assessments: "This seems like a strong case"
before.pain2: No quantitative basis for case evaluation
before.pain3: Miss emerging trends and pattern shifts
before.pain5: Clients ask for win probability - you can't answer with data

after.title: With Lexora Statistical Analytics
after.benefit1: Data-driven assessments: "Cases like this succeed 73% of the time"
after.benefit4: Compare argument effectiveness with hard numbers
after.benefit5: Answer client questions with statistical evidence

faq.q1: How accurate are the statistical analyses?
faq.a1: Our analytics engine processes 1M+ court decisions with 85%+ pattern recognition accuracy. All statistics are based on actual case outcomes, not predictions. We show sample sizes so you can assess statistical significance.
faq.q2: Can I query custom statistics beyond the examples shown?
faq.a2: Yes! Our natural language query interface lets you ask virtually any statistical question about the dataset. Ask about success rates, trends, patterns, correlations - if it's in the data, we can analyze it.
faq.q3: How often is statistical data updated?
faq.a3: Our database is updated daily with new court decisions. Statistics reflect the most current data available, with clear timestamps showing data freshness.
faq.q4: Do other legal research platforms offer this?
faq.a4: No. Lexora is the only legal research platform in the Western Balkans (and one of very few globally) offering sophisticated statistical querying. Most platforms only show individual cases - we show patterns across millions of cases.

hero.title: Multi-Level AI Case Summarization in Seconds
hero.subtitle: Generate comprehensive case summaries at three different depth levels. From 30-second overviews to detailed analytical breakdowns - all AI-powered and instant.

levels.title: Choose Your Summary Depth
levels.subtitle: Three levels designed for different workflows - from quick scanning to deep analysis

level1.name: Quick Overview
level1.useCase: Perfect for initial case screening and triage

level2.name: Standard Summary
level2.description: Balanced detail for most research needs

includes.i3: Main legal arguments from both sides
includes.i6: Outcome with key points from decision

level2.useCase: Ideal for legal research and case comparison

level3.name: Detailed Analysis

includes.i3: Complete legal argumentation from all parties
includes.i4: In-depth analysis of court's legal reasoning
includes.i5: All statutory provisions and case law cited

level3.useCase: For in-depth case study and brief preparation

examples.title: See Summaries in Action
examples.subtitle: Real case summaries showing each level's depth

example.citation: Administrative Court of Montenegro, Case No. 123/2023

quick.title: Quick Overview (30 sec)
quick.content: Appeal against denial of building permit for residential complex in coastal zone. Appellant: Developer LLC. Respondent: Ministry of Sustainable Development. Court ruled in favor of Ministry, upholding permit denial due to inadequate environmental impact assessment. Appeal denied.

standard.title: Standard Summary (2-3 min)
standard.content:
Developer LLC appealed the Ministry's decision denying a building permit for a 50-unit residential complex in a protected coastal zone. The developer argued that their environmental impact assessment (EIA) met all statutory requirements and that the Ministry's denial was arbitrary. The Ministry countered that the EIA failed to adequately address impact on protected bird species and coastal erosion risks.

The Court found that the Law on Environmental Impact Assessment requires specific analysis of impacts on protected species, which the developer's EIA lacked. The Court also noted that coastal zone construction requires heightened scrutiny under the Spatial Planning Law. The Ministry's decision was deemed legally sound and proportionate to the environmental risks identified.

Appeal denied. No procedural violations found.

detailed.title: Detailed Analysis (5-7 min)
detailed.content: Full procedural history, complete argumentation from both parties, detailed analysis of all legal provisions (Articles 15, 23, and 41 of Environmental Impact Assessment Law; Articles 8 and 12 of Spatial Planning Law), discussion of three precedent cases cited, examination of EU Directive compliance requirements, analysis of proportionality test applied by court, implications for future coastal development projects, and precedential value for similar cases.

benefit1.title: 10x Faster Case Review
benefit1.description: Read a detailed summary in 3 minutes instead of spending 30+ minutes reading the full decision

benefit2.title: Consistent Quality
benefit2.description: AI extracts the same key elements every time - no important details missed due to fatigue or time pressure

benefit3.title: Multiple Cases at Once
benefit3.description: Review 20 cases in the time it would take to read 2 full decisions - perfect for comprehensive research

benefit4.title: Flexible Depth
benefit4.description: Start with Quick Overview for screening, then dive deeper only on relevant cases - optimize your research workflow

benefit5.title: Multilingual Summaries
benefit5.description: Get summaries in your preferred language regardless of the original decision's language

benefit6.title: Export & Share
benefit6.description: Copy summaries directly into briefs, research memos, or client communications with proper citations

before.title: Traditional Case Reading
before.pain2: Manually identify key facts and legal issues
before.pain3: Easy to miss important details in lengthy decisions
before.pain4: Difficult to compare multiple cases efficiently
before.pain5: Slows down research when reviewing many cases

after.title: With Lexora AI Summarization
after.benefit1: 30 seconds to 7 minutes depending on detail needed
after.benefit2: AI automatically extracts key elements consistently
after.benefit3: Structured summaries ensure no critical information missed
after.benefit4: Quickly compare summaries of 10+ cases side-by-side
after.benefit5: Review 10x more cases in the same amount of time

faq.q1: How accurate are the AI-generated summaries?
faq.a1: Our summarization AI achieves 95%+ accuracy in extracting key case elements. Every summary includes a citation to the full decision so you can verify details. We recommend using summaries for research and screening, then reviewing full decisions for cases you'll cite in court filings.
faq.q2: Can I customize what's included in summaries?
faq.a2: Currently we offer three preset levels (Quick, Standard, Detailed) that cover the most common research needs. Custom summary templates are planned for enterprise users in 2025.
faq.q3: Do summaries work for all three jurisdictions?
faq.a3: Yes! Our AI is trained on administrative court decisions from Montenegro, Serbia, and Croatia. Summary quality is consistent across all jurisdictions and languages.
faq.q4: Can I export summaries to Word or PDF?
faq.a4: Absolutely. You can copy summaries with proper citations directly into your documents, or export them as formatted Word/PDF files. All summaries include the official case citation for proper attribution.

hero.title: Discover Precedent Chains Automatically with AI
hero.subtitle: Trace how legal reasoning evolved across related cases. Our AI maps citation networks and identifies influential precedents in seconds - work that used to take hours.

features.feature4: Timeline view of legal reasoning evolution

visualization.title: See Your Case in Context

howItWorks.title: How Precedent Mapping Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From citation chaos to clear precedent chains in seconds

step1.title: Upload or Select Your Case
step1.description: Start with any court decision from our database or upload your own brief to find relevant precedents

step2.title: AI Analyzes Citations & Legal Issues
step2.description: Our AI reads the decision, identifies legal issues, extracts all cited cases, and analyzes the reasoning structure

step3.title: Map Precedent Network
step3.description: System builds a visual network showing how cases cite each other, which precedents are most influential, and where reasoning diverges

step4.title: Calculate Relevance Scores
step4.description: Each precedent gets a relevance score based on legal similarity, citation frequency, jurisdiction, and outcome alignment

step5.title: Explore Interactive Map
step5.description: Click any case to see its summary, citation path, and how it influenced the legal reasoning in your target case

case1.title: Lawyers Building Stronger Arguments
case1.description: Identify the most persuasive precedent chain to support your legal argument. See which cases courts cite most favorably.

benefits.benefit1: Find the strongest precedent chain in minutes
benefits.benefit3: Build citation strategy based on influence scores

case2.title: Judges Ensuring Consistency

case3.title: Researchers Tracking Legal Evolution

comparison.title: Manual vs AI Precedent Research
comparison.subtitle: Stop spending hours tracing citations manually

step1.title: Read full decision and extract citations

step2.title: Look up each cited case individually

step3.title: Read those cases to find their citations

step1.title: AI reads decision and extracts all precedents
step1.description: Instant citation extraction across all levels

step2.title: System maps complete precedent network
step2.description: Builds visual graph showing all relationships

step3.title: Relevance scores calculated automatically
step3.description: AI ranks precedents by influence and similarity

faq.q1: How does the AI determine precedent relevance?
faq.a1: Our AI analyzes multiple factors: citation frequency across cases, legal issue similarity, jurisdictional weight, outcome alignment, and temporal relevance. Cases cited more often by courts in similar situations get higher relevance scores.
faq.q2: Can I see precedents across all three jurisdictions?
faq.a2: Yes! One of Lexora's unique features is cross-jurisdictional precedent mapping. You can see how courts in Montenegro, Serbia, and Croatia cite each other's decisions and identify common legal principles across borders.
faq.q3: What if a case cites 50+ precedents?
faq.a3: No problem. The system handles cases with hundreds of citations. You can filter by relevance score, jurisdiction, date range, or legal issue to focus on the most important precedents for your research.
faq.q4: Can I export the precedent map?
faq.a4: Absolutely. Export precedent maps as visual diagrams (PNG/PDF) or as structured lists with summaries of each case. Perfect for including in research memos or teaching materials.

hero.title: Transforming Legal Research with AI
hero.subtitle: Built by Codeus, Lexora is the first multilingual, cross-jurisdictional legal AI assistant in the Western Balkans, empowering legal professionals with faster, more accurate research.

story.title: First Legal AI for the Western Balkans
story.paragraph1: In 2024, Codeus recognized a critical gap in legal technology across Montenegro, Serbia, and Croatia. Legal professionals were spending days manually searching through court decisions, unable to efficiently compare rulings across jurisdictions or identify patterns in judicial outcomes.
story.paragraph2: We built Lexora to solve this problem. Using state-of-the-art RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) technology, we created the region's first AI-powered legal research assistant specialized in administrative law. Lexora provides comprehensive coverage of 1M+ court decisions across three jurisdictions in four languages.
story.paragraph3: Today, Lexora empowers judges, lawyers, researchers, and citizens with instant access to legal information that was previously scattered across multiple systems and nearly impossible to analyze at scale.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: We're on a mission to democratize access to legal information and make justice more transparent and accessible across the Western Balkans

accessibility.title: Democratize Legal Access
accessibility.description: Make comprehensive legal research available to everyone—from judges and lawyers to citizens seeking to understand their rights.

accuracy.title: Ensure AI Accuracy
accuracy.description: Deliver the highest accuracy legal AI in the market, with target >85% accuracy and <10% hallucination rate, outperforming global competitors.

innovation.title: Drive Regional Innovation
innovation.description: Position the Western Balkans as a leader in legal technology innovation and contribute to European digital justice initiatives.

technology.title: Powered by Advanced RAG Technology
technology.subtitle: Lexora uses state-of-the-art Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to deliver accurate, contextual legal insights

rag.title: What is RAG?
rag.description: RAG combines the power of semantic search with AI generation. Instead of relying solely on pre-trained knowledge, Lexora retrieves relevant legal documents first, then generates answers grounded in actual case law—dramatically reducing hallucinations and improving accuracy.

crossJurisdictional.title: Cross-Jurisdictional Legal Search | Search 3 Countries Simultaneously
crossJurisdictional.description: Search administrative court decisions across Montenegro, Serbia, and Croatia in one query. AI-powered cross-border legal research for judges, lawyers, and researchers.

caseSummarization.title: AI Case Summarization | Multi-Level Legal Summaries
caseSummarization.description: Generate instant case summaries at any depth level. From quick overviews to detailed analysis in under 10 seconds with 95%+ accuracy.

precedentMapping.title: AI Precedent Mapping | Automated Citation Network Analysis
precedentMapping.description: Trace precedent chains automatically with AI. Visual citation networks, influence scoring, and cross-jurisdictional precedent tracking in seconds.
